questions.title: Overall rating (1 very bad - 4 very good):
General problems you optionally can ask the chairman about
subquestion: 1b: Did the polling station open too late?
2b: Are there any sign of campaign materials or activity in, or in close proximity to, the PS?
3b: Are voters being offered any inducements to vote in a particular manner?
4b: If there are police present, are they behaving in an appropriate manner?
5b: Is access to the polling station challenging for disabled people?
6b: Is the PSO trained in a satisfactory manner
7b: Is the chairman trained in a satisfactory manner?

questions.title: Indications of problems
subquestion: 8b: Do you see any indications of tension/unrest inside or outside the polling station?
9b: ... of unauthorized persons being present at the polling station?
10b: ... of voters inappropriately being turned away?
11b: ... of inappropriate booths, screens, light supply that fail to ensure the secrecy of the vote?
12b: ... of group (family) voting?
13b: ... of proxy voting (unless specified by law)?
14b: ... of multiple voting?
15b: ... of ballot-box stuffing?
16b: ... of unsealed or inadequately sealed ballot boxes?
17b: ... of pre-marked ballots?
18b: ... of purposely damaging ballots?
19b: ... of absence of necessary voting information materials?
20b: ... of excessive delays in administering the voting?
21b: ... of inappropriate activity by representatives of political parties or individual candidates?
22b: ... of interference with the work of election commissions or observers?

questions.title: Checking of voters
subquestion: 23b: Did the PSO check the voters’ IDs?
24b: Did the PSO sign and stamp the ballots?
25b: Did the voters sign the voter list?
26b: Did voters mark their ballots in secrecy?

questions.title: The overall conduct at this PS was (1 very bad - 4 very good)
subquestion: 27b: Procedures followed
28b: PSO’s understanding of voting procedures
29b: Performance of PSO
30b: Transparency of the voting process
31b: Attitude of the PSO towards you as international election observers
